code: import*as Yup from"yup";export const SearchValidationSchema=Yup.object().shape({name:Yup.string().min(4,"Name can not be less than 4 characters").required("A Name is required")});export const TransferValidationSchema=Yup.object().shape({address:Yup.string().min(45,"Address invalid").required("An address is required")});
